title: THE DAMNED Trailer [Horror Movie - 2014]
description: Heaven helps us... THE DAMNED Trailer. In theaters August 29 ✓ Subscribe Here & NOW ➨ http://bit.ly/Movietrailers ★ HORROR Fan ? Don't miss THIS ➨ http://bit.ly/Horror-Movie ➨ Join us on Facebook http://facebook.com/HorrorScifiMovies ★★★ The MUST-SEE Movies ➨ http://bit.ly/The-Best-Movies THE DAMNED tells the story of American David Reynolds (Peter Facinelli), widowed from his Colombian-born wife, who flies to Bogota with his new fiancée (Sophia Myles) to retrieve his rebellious teenage daughter Jill (Nathalia Ramos). En route to the city of Medellin, a car accident leaves them stranded in a run-down isolated inn. When they discover the old innkeeper has locked a young girl in the basement, they are determined to set her free. In saving the young girl, they ultimately unleash an ancient evil that's been waiting to wreak havoc on all that cross its path. A Movie directed by Victor Garcia Cast :Peter Facinelli, Sophia Myles, Nathalia Ramos, Sebastian Martinez Release Date : In Theaters August 29th, 2014 Genre : Horror, Thriller THE DAMNED Trailer © 2014 IFC Films ✓ Subscribe now 2 catch the best trailers and the latest HD official movie trailer, film clip, scene and video !
